attributes.action: Hand Out of Hours Doctors service back to local GP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning to have 'Out of hours' doctors services taken away from commercial companies/call centres and handed back to local G.Ps surgeries. Many people have had a negative experience with these companies/service and your local GP surgery knows its patients and their history and requirements in a way a stranger never could....
